channel.title: Posts on WhyNot a Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WhyNot a Blog

item.title: _start
item.description: Booting from Hard Disk... -> Introduction: This is the first blog-post of a serie that’s going to document my journey developing my own operating system, each blog-post under the OSDEV tag will tackle a concept/component of the OS, while having sub-tags to make it easier to search for the multi-parts blogs of the same concept. -> What to expect and not to expect from this blog: Expect: showcasing milestone of the Yona Operating system.
